sentences: Meie pole veel kordagi k√§inud selles kohvikus
context: The Estonian word 'kordagi' is an adverb that means 'never' or 'not even once'. It's composed of 'korra' (once) and the suffix '-gi' (also/either), forming a negative construction. This word indicates that something has not happened at any time in the past and implies it won't happen either.
